typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Flight#} as string,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,
		FlightDate as string,
		NoSalesReason as string,
		TransmittingFlightAttd as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Source
Source derive(NewCol = locate(NoSalesReason, 'Other')) ~> NewCol
NewCol sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> outputrim
